amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out a final rule and notice of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3970 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 9. Record Vote Number: 80.

action.text: Amendment SA 3970 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S3015-3017; text: CR S3015) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out a final rule and notice of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3970 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3970 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 9. Record Vote Number: 80.
